name: FrameworkwithAnaTrujilloLimón
0:
”Alexa, launch Framework Podcast.”
”Alexa, ask Framework Podcast to play the latest episode.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: framework podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Framework Podcast is designed to help financial advisors challenge the status quo, grow your firm, and not only put the best practices to use, but create new best practices altogether. Hosted by Ana Trujillo Limón. Brought to you by Carson Coaching.

Enable this skill then say, "Alexa, ask Framework Podcast to play the latest episode."

More phrases you can say:

First say, "Alexa, open Framework Podcast."
...
"Tell me about Carson Coaching - Framework Podcast."
"Tell me about the company."
"Tell me about Ana."
"Tell me about Ana Trujillo Limón."
"Play the latest episode."

Learn more: carsongroup.com/framework

About Carson Group:
Carson Group is an entire ecosystem dedicated to help advisors better serve their clients and grow their firm. Advisors are able to unleash their firm’s full potential either through Carson Coaching, one of the largest advisor coaching programs in the nation, or by joining Carson Partners to receive industry leading marketing, technology, compliance, investments, succession planning and mergers & acquisition support.

About Carson Wealth:
Founded in 1983 by Ron Carson, Carson Wealth has grown to become a Barron’s Hall of Fame advisory firm with offices spread across the United States. Carson Wealth is dedicated to helping clients pursue their definition of true wealth through holistic financial planning, disciplined investment strategies, and proactive personal service.

About Carson Coaching:
Carson Coaching is one of the largest advisor coaching networks in the country, with over 2,500 alumni using our proven strategies to grow their firms. Our coaches and our online learning hub help advisors grow on their own terms, serve their clients with integrity and leave a lasting impact.

Follow: 
Twitter: @CarsonGroupLLC
Instagram: @carson_group

Investment Advisory Services offered through CWM, LLC, an SEC Registered Investment Advisors. Carson Partners, a division of CWM, LLC is a nationwide partnership of advisors.

Request an invite to launch your hands-free homepage and podcast on Alexa at WealthVoice.ai
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
